name: The Lone Warrior
storyline: The story is incomplete but tells the tale of low class peasant who was stupid enough to go into war based on an infatuation for a princess. He dies but is granted the power of rebirth by a nameless divine entity who aids him in his quest for strength.
summary: This game is a combination of the endless running games like subway surfer and the chrome dinosaur game as well as Fighting games like Tekken. You run across the battlefield fighting different types of enemies using unique moves. This game tests your memory, your reflexes and your observations skills.
